title: My Intimate Poetry: Beneath the Vin Rouge
description: Music voices the words that remain untold.Tammy is back with her attempt at poetic verse and rhyme; only this time she’s taking you a little deeper into the glass of red that is her life…Speaking of adultery, mistreatment and heartbreak, Tammy pushes the boundaries set by society’s hatred for taboo and endeavours to expose the ugly truth through softening words. But while revealing sections of what lies behind the darkest closed doors, she also brings to attention the struggling and strong relationships between friends and family. Each line uncovers another little jigsaw piece of the mysterious writer hidden within the words, but it’s up to you to figure out what the shards say…
author: Tammy-Louise Wilkins
